EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-11-14 Know Before You Go AWS ReInvent.Thanks for joining us
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for joining {{my.Webinar Title:default=Our Webinar}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for joining our webinar on {{my.Webinar Title:default=The Webinar}}.
- Watch it again on-demand here <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/on-demand-webinars/webinar-know-before-you-go-aws-re-invent-2018]]> - Get the slides here <[[https://turbonomic.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/AWS-KnowBeforeYouGo-Webinar.pdf]]> - Schedule a meeting on-site with our executives here <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/reinvent2018/external_request/0ce7a1]]> - Let us know if you'd like help to get your AWS Certification here <[[mailto: eric.wright@turbonomic.com]]> - Register for our next webinar on 12/5, Top 5 Takeaways from AWS re:Invent, here <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]> - Vote for your favorite part about re:Invent here <[[https://twitter.com/Turbonomic/status/1062736648583200770]]>
If you have any additional questions about how Turbonomic can help your IT organization optimize for performance, cost, and compliance in real-time, we'll be at booth 615 in the expo.
We hope you enjoy the recording!
-Team Turbonomic
